mapper.select: select t2.*,t3.name as reviewer_name,t1.status,t1.title,t1.content,t1.keywords,t1.authors, t5.* from user_article t1 right join reviewer_replay t2 ON t1.article_id = t2.article_id right join userinfo t3 on t2.reviewer_id = t3.user_id right join meeting_article t4 on t1.article_id = t4.article_id right join meetinginfo t5 on t5.meeting_id = t4.meeting_id where t1.article_id = #{articleId} and t1.status < 10
